item.title: Old
item.description: Skills Segment 2D images Create 3D fonts Design 3D manipulators for target applications Repair 3D meshes to enable 3D printing Perform boolean operations on 3D meshes to construct complex 3D objects Utilize and port algorithms from ITK (Insight Toolkit) and VTK (Visualization Toolkit) Design hybrid volume-geometry rendering systems Apply PCA (Principal Component Analysis) to reduce the dimensionality of large datasets
